Name: Summon Castle
Description: Summon a castle with a crossbowman.
Ally: Build a castle!
Enemy: Enemy builds a castle!

Name: Summon Flower Castle
Description: Summon a castle with a trumpeter and two crossbowmen.
Ally: Build a flower castle!
Enemy: Enemy builds a flower castle!

Name: Summon Rabbit Rower
Description: Summon a tower with a stone-throwing rabbitman.
Ally: Build a rabbit tower!
Enemy: Enemy builds a rabbit tower!

Ally: Build an undead tower!
Enemy: Enemy builds an undead tower!

Ally: Build a great tower!
Enemy: Enemy builds a great tower!

Ally: Build a healing tent!
Enemy: Enemy builds a healing tent!

Ally: Build a pyramid!
Enemy: Enemy builds a pyramid!

Ally: Build a fortress!
Enemy: Enemy builds a fortress!

Ally: Build a cannon tower!
Enemy: Enemy builds a cannon tower!

Name: Air Domain
Description: Establish an air element domain. Enemies in a large area will be more susceptible to air damage.
Enemy: Enemy establishes a domain of air!

Name: Airburst
Description: Create an airburst that inflicts air damage to air enemies in a medium area.

Name: Blizzard
Description: Summon an enormous blizzard that covers a large area. It will inflict continuous water damage to enemies and apply a freeze status.
Enemy: A blizzard! Take cover!

Name: Cold Air
Description: Unleash a cold air that deals minor continuous water damage and apply cold status to enemies.
Enemy: Enemy conjures cold air!

Name: Death Cloud
Description: Release a death cloud that deals continuous poison damage and applies deadly poison status to enemies.
Enemy: Enemy unleashes a death cloud!

Name: Decay
Enemy: Enemy spreads decay!

Name: Earth Domain
Description: Establish an air element domain. Enemies in a large area will be more susceptible to earth damage.
Enemy: Enemy establishes a domain of earth!

Name: Earth Eruption
Description: Create an earth eruption spike that deals earth damage and high impact in a medium area.
Enemy: Enemy erupts the ground!

Name: Earth Wall
Description: Summon an earthen wall that can block incoming enemies' attacks and spells.
Enemy: Enemy erects an earthen wall!

Name: Fire Barrage
Description: Conjure a barrage of fire bolts. Cover a large area but lack penetration.
Enemy: Enemy calls down fire barrage!

Name: Fire Domain
Description: Establish an air element domain. Enemies in a large area will be more susceptible to fire damage.
Enemy: Enemy establishes a domain of fire!

Name: Firewall
Description: Conjure a long firewall at the selected area. Deal continuous fire damage to passing enemies.
Enemy: Enemy convokes a wall of flame!

Name: Flash
Description: Create a flash of light that blinds enemies in a medium area.
Enemy: Enemy casts a flash!

Name: Great Fireball
Description: Conjure a large fireball. Explode when in contact with an enemy and deal additional damage to enemies in a large area.
Enemy: Enemy casts a great fireball!

Name: Drop Huge Stone
Description: Summon a huge stone to crush from the sky to crush enemies. Can hit only ground unit.
Ally: Bring forth the strength of stone.
Enemy: Enemy calls a large stone descends from the sky!

Name: Hurricane
Description: Summon a hurricane at the selected air area. Deal continuous damage to passing air enemies.
Enemy: Enemy summons a hurricane!

Name: Ice Orb
Description: Cast down an ice orb at enemies in a medium area. Will inflict freezing status.
Enemy: Enemy drops an ice orb!

Name: Ice Pillar
Description: Conjure an ice pillar that deals high upward impact. Also inflict cold and stagger status on affected enemies.
Enemy: Enemy raises an ice pillar!

Name: Invisible
Description: Grant allies in a medium area with invisible status.
Enemy: Enemies becomes invisible!

Name: Lightning Strike
Description: Conjure a lightning strike. Deal high air damage and paralyse enemies in a small area.
Enemy: Enemy calls down a lightning!

Name: Magic Bolts
Description: Unleash a hail of magic bolts on enemies in medium area.
Enemy: Enemy unleashes magic bolts!

Name: Magic Bomb
Description: Drop a magic bomb that explodes and deals magic damage in a medium area.
Enemy: Enemy deploys a magic bomb!

Name: Magic Domain
Description: Establish a magic element domain. Enemies in a large area will be more susceptible to magic damage.
Enemy: Enemy establishes a domain of magic!

Name: Mass Blind
Description: Inflict blind on enemies in a medium area.
Enemy: Enemy casts mass blind!

Name: Mass Confuse
Description: Inflict confusion on enemies in a medium area.
Enemy: Enemy invokes mass confuse!

Name: Mass Curse
Description: Cast a curse  spell to enemies in a large area.
Enemy: Enemy casts mass curse!

Name: Mass Haste
Description: Cast a haste spell to allies in a large area.
Enemy: Enemy invokes mass haste!

Name: Mass Slow
Description: Cast a slow spell to enemies in a large area.
Enemy: Enemy inflicts mass slow!

Name: Mass Strength
Description: Cast a strengthen spell to allies in a large area.
Enemy: Enemy imposes mass strength!

Name: Mass Weakness
Description: Cast a weakness spell to enemies in a large area.
Enemy: Enemy inflicts mass weakness!

Name: Meteor
Description: Conjure a meteor. Deal extremely high fire damage to enemies in a very large area.
Ally: The great earth is but the opposite of the vast sky. Converge then diverge.
Enemy: A meteor! Run for your life!

Name: Oil Ball
Description: Drop an oil ball on enemies in a medium area. Inflict earth damage and oiled status.
Enemy: Enemy drops an oil ball!

Name: Poison Domain
Description: Establish an air element domain. Enemies in a large area will be more susceptible to poison damage.
Enemy: Enemy establishes a domain of poison!

Name: Skeleton Horde
Description: Summon a horde of skeletons that can throw bones at enemies.
Enemy: Enemy gathers a skeleton horde!

Name: Smoke
Enemy: Enemy creates a smoke!

Name: Stone Rain
Description: Call down a hail of stone that will fall into a large area. Can hit only ground unit.
Ally: Bring forth the abundance of stone.
Enemy: Enemy summons a hail of stone!

Name: Water Domain
Description: Establish an air element domain. Enemies in a large area will be more susceptible to water damage.
Enemy: Enemy establishes a domain of water!

Name: Zombie Horde
Description: Summon a horde of zombies that are slow and tough.
Enemy: Enemy beckons a zombie horde from the ground!

Name: Abandon All Hope
Description: Let the enemies understand there is no hope for victory. They will run away in panic.
Ally: Abandon any semblance of hope, there is no victory to be had in your futile struggle.

Name: Absolute Command
Description: Assert absolute authority. Remove false commands in a large area.
Ally: Obey my authority and rid all doubts.

Name: Absolute Might
Description: Only by true might can a commander lead a strong army.
Ally: Yield to me or die!

Name: Age Of Heroes
Description: All can become a hero. They only need to see an example.
Ally: Here is thus the Age of Heroes. Fight well for the new age to come.
Enemy: The Age of Heroes is bestowed and abode once more. May perished becomes legacy.

Name: Arcane Blossom
Description: Diffuse mana in the air. Apply health and resource generation to allies in a large area.

Name: Betrayal
Description: Loyalty is not permanent. Make some enemies change to your side for a while.
Ally: There is no worth in committing to your duty. Join me, and you may yet live.
Enemy: Betrayal! Our troops are turning on us!

Name: Blazing Heart
Description: Light up one heart to highly increase offensive power.

Name: Bravery
Description: Instil bravery in allies in a medium area, and they will be more effective in an offensive.
Ally: Be brave, my fellow! I am here with you, always!
Enemy: The enemies become braver! Beware of great offensives.

Name: Bribery Betrayal
Description: Loyalty can be bought. Even a promise of money can waver the heart of the weak.
Ally: It is time to earn your contract, stab their back!
Enemy: The enemy bribes our troops! Some may turn on us!

Name: Brilliance
Description: Brilliantly execute a support strategy. All will fight beyond their capabilities.
Ally: In brilliance will we reach the heavenly perfection of life.
Enemy: The enemy perpetrates brilliance! Only our finest will be able to match them.

Name: Chaos Invasion
Description: Open the summoning gate to summon fellow demons into the world.

Name: Clarity
Description: Clear minds to dispel negative psychological effects.
Ally: Clear your confusion; such trifling trickery will bring no victory.

Name: Command Collapse
Description: Collapse the command of enemies in a large area into an ineffective false attack.
Ally: A false message: Protect that ground, move not enemy at you now.
Enemy: The enemy collapses our command! Our troops remain idle instead of attacking!

Name: Commander's Duty
Description: The duty of the commander is to first ensure that the troops understand the orders and respond in the most efficient manner.

Name: Coward's Conviction
Description: All allies in a medium area will run away and recover.
Ally: To live and fight another day brings not scorn to the future victor.
Enemy: Our enemies intend to flee. Perhaps a pursuit is suggestible?

Name: Cowardice
Description: Inflict cowardice on enemies in a small area. They will run from the battle for some time.
Ally: Run away or perish!
Enemy: Our allies become cowards! The enemy's meddling, no doubt!

Name: Crisis Measurement
Description: All must do their best to avert the crisis. Allies in a medium area will be significantly improved in the defence and speed departments.

Name: Deception
Description: Nearby allies in a medium area become invisible.
Ally: They will expect but exact nothing.
Enemy: Deception! Our enemies become invisible and will strike at us unseen!

Name: Defiance
Description: Defy all oppressions. Enter into the state of absolute defence.
Ally: We will not surrender! Fight to the last!
Enemy: The enemies are defying our might! Maintain our offensive.

Name: Demoralise
Description: Inflict enemies in a medium area with fear and terror. Making them unable to fight at full potential.
Ally: Futility in all of your merits! Only your widows will remain after this defeat.

Name: Determination
Description: Determined to be victorious, all allies in a large area become more confident in their attacks.
Ally: Be determined and be victorious, ye courageous and righteous soldiers.

Name: Discipline
Description: Instil discipline in nearby allies, making them more effective in battle.

Name: Diversion
Description: Create a diversion for a small group of enemies. They will try to retreat from combat.
Ally: A false message: The enemies are elsewhere!
Enemy: The enemy create diversion on us! Our troops are moving away from combat!

Name: Divine Potency
Description: Empower nearby allies with divine power that enhances their fighting ability.

Name: Divine Purity
Description: Clear all impurity from nearby allies in a large area with holy radiance.
Ally: May we ever be blessed in the embrace of innocence.

Name: Dread Fury
Description: Emit raw might. Nearby allies will enter the stage of frenzy, and nearby enemies will become fearful.
Ally: Stand and despair. Fall and die.

Name: Dream Of Unification
Ally: We will unite once more to glory old.

Name: Encourage
Description: Encourage nearby allies. They will fight slightly better.
Ally: Fear not, my allies! Victory is sure to come for us, the righteous!

Name: Ensnare
Description: Slow down the enemies in a large area.
Ally: Slow down the enemies, their speed will bring them no victory.
Enemy: Our troops become ensnared with slowness!

Name: Entrap
Description: Entrap multiple enemies in place.
Enemy: The enemy tries to entrap us! Brace yourself!

Name: Escalation Of Conflict
Description: Inflict allies with escalation effect. They will first become weaker but gradually grow stronger over time.
Ally: Prepare, endure, then destroy.
Enemy: The enemy escalates the battle! Kill them before they can!

Name: Establish Control
Description: Establish control over your army. Remove negative psychological status effects and improve defence.

Name: False Advance
Description: Inflict enemies with a false advance command. They will forcefully move toward your army.
Ally: Your lord is nought but a fraud! You are but a mere cattle for following them so blindly!

Name: False Idle
Description: Inflict enemies with a false idle command. They will stand around instead of moving to attack.
Ally: A false message: Stand your ground, await further command.

Name: False Retreat
Description: Inflict enemies with a false retreat command. They will forcefully retreat from battle.
Ally: A false message: Retreat to the main camp!

Name: Finest Mastery
Description: Display the finest combat mastery with drastic speed and power. Improve the commander's speed and resource generation.
Ally: Behold my cultivation of a lifetime!

Name: Forgotten Pain
Description: Use medicinal properties on allies in a medium area. They will heal from minor damage and enter an aggressive state.
Ally: Forget your pain and fear. I am here with you.

Name: Foundation Of An Empire
Description: A battle to found an empire, one at a time. Allies in a very large area become significantly more effective in combat.

Name: Gate Of Hell
Description: Open the summoning gate to summon demon warriors into the world.
Ally: Come forth, my fellows, the new Eden awaits us.

Name: God Of War
Description: Apotheosise into a god of war embodiment. Nearby allies gain extraordinary improvement in all aspects.

Name: God Speed
Description: Bestow allies in a huge area with unmatchable speed.

Name: Great Assault
Description: Launch a great assault. Allies in a large area become better at attacking.
Ally: Come, my soldiers! Do not let the enemies have any advantage!
Enemy: Enemies launch a great assault! Prepare the defence!

Name: Great Destruction
Description: Unleash great destruction! The commander will receive incredible offensive power.
Ally: Observe the dissolution of all that you love, for they are in the equation of your sins.

Name: Great Enlightenment
Description: Grant nearby allies with enlightenment. They will be able to gain more and use fewer resources to execute skills.

Name: Great Manoeuvre
Description: Perform a great manoeuvre. Allies in a large area can move faster.

Name: Great Taunt
Description: Taunt enemies and inflict provoke status on enemies, making them focus on attack rather than defend.
Ally: Come, you knaves! Come, and take your fill!

Name: Greed
Description: Instil the power of greed into allies. They will fight to the utmost, even at the cost of their life.

Name: Guardian Star
Description: Become a guardian star. Gain superb speed and regeneration.

Name: Imperial Decree
Description: Issue an imperial decree. In a huge area, allies gain a superb defensive buff while enemies become fearful.

Name: Incite Panic
Description: Incite panic among enemies in a medium area. Rendering them less combat effective overall.
Ally: When there is no order, then only chaos remains!

Name: Ingenuity
Description: Display ingenuity that can change the world. Commander will be able to gain more and use fewer resources to execute skills.

Name: Insight Echo
Description: Offer great insight to nearby allies in a small area. This will clear their mind and improve their skill usage capability.

Name: Justice
Description: Become the avatar of justice and punish wrongdoers with impunity. Significantly improve overall combat capability.
Ally: Come, thus justice to being!
Enemy: Enemies intend to exact justice. Return them the retribution they so crave!

Name: Lightning Advance
Description: Advance at a lightning speed! Allies in a large area will move faster and attack better.
Enemy: Enemies execute a lightning advance! Can we match them?

Name: Loyalty
Description: Assert loyalty. Rid allies in a large area of negative psychological effect and boost defence.

Name: Lure
Description: Lure enemies in a small area into forced advance.
Enemy: Enemy lures our troops! Support them!

Name: Majesty
Description: Exude a majestic aspect. Nearby allies in a large area become better in combat.

Name: Master Plan Initiative
Description: Launch a master plan. Allies in a large area will receive offensive improvement and heal. Also, remove negative psychological effects.
Ally: The time is now.

Name: Mastery
Description: Exert one's own mastery. Improve resource regeneration and speed.
Ally: Witness mastery of the age!
Enemy: Enemy demonstrates mastery! Their commander will be ready for our attack.

Name: Military Masterpiece
Description: Conduct a historical strategic manoeuvre. Nearby allies in a very large area gain an offence and speed augmentation.

Name: Minor Combat Aid
Description: Provide moderate healing to allies in a medium area.
Ally: Receive well my support and requite with your renewed strength.

Name: Minor Defensive
Description: Improve the defence of allies in a large area.

Name: Minor Demoralise
Description: Inflict fear on enemies in a large area.
Enemy: Enemy demoralises us with fear!

Name: Minor Discipline
Description: Moderately improve the offence and defence capability of allies in a small area.
Enemy: Enemy establishes discipline among the troops! They will be more ready for us now.

Name: Minor Encourage
Description: Encourage nearby allies in a small area. They will fight slightly better.
Ally: Fight!
Enemy: Enemy encourages their troops to fight better!

Name: Minor False Advance
Description: Inflict enemies in a small area with a false advance command. They will forcefully move toward your army.
Ally: Your lord is nought but a fraud! You are but a mere cattle for following them so blindly!
Enemy: Enemy confuses our troops into a false advance!

Name: Minor False Idle
Description: Inflict enemies in a small area with a false idle command. They will stand around instead of moving to attack.
Ally: A false message: Stand your ground, await further command.
Enemy: Enemy confuses our troops into idleness!

Name: Minor False Retreat
Description: Inflict enemies in a small area with a false retreat command. They will forcefully retreat from battle.
Ally: A false message: Retreat to the main camp!
Enemy: Enemy confuses our troops into a false retreat!

Name: Minor Great Cure
Description: Remove negative physical status from nearby allies in a large area.
Ally: Let me cure you of ailments.
Enemy: Enemy cure their troops of negative physical status!

Name: Minor Strengthen
Description: Improve the offence of allies in a large area.

Name: Minor Prayer
Description: Offer blessings to allies in a large area.
Ally: Show me your will to live and listen well to the guidance of the lord.

Name: Minor Rally
Description: Rally allies in a small area to move faster.
Ally: Full speed!

Name: Miracle Fortuity
Description: Miracle of life. Heal allies in a medium area.

Name: Omen Of Victory
Description: Omen of victory has been observed. Allies in a huge area will fight to the fullest to achieve it.

Name: On The Defensive
Description: Defend at all costs. Allies in a large area gain a significant defensive boost.

Name: Pathfinding
Description: Lead your allies through tough terrains. Allies in a medium area gain a significant speed boost.

Name: Purification
Description: Perform purification. Dispel all manners of negative effects from allies in a huge area.

Name: Rally
Description: Rally allies in a large area to move faster.

Name: Rune Craft
Description: Craft a rune of manipulation that makes nearby allies in a very large area use fewer skill resources.

Name: Salvation
Ally: Embrace willingly in the divine, and salvation will come.

Name: Steady Advance
Description: Conduct a steady advance. Allies in a large area will gain speed and defence increases.

Name: Terror
Description: Implant terror in the minds of enemies in a large area.

Name: Unity
Description: Create unity among friends in a large area. Moderately improve their combat powers.

Name: Web Of Deception
Description: Establish the web of deception. Allies in a huge area gain combat improvement, while enemies receive provoke and confuse status.

Name: Will Domination
Description: Dominate the minds of enemies in a medium area. They will betray and join your side.

Name: Test Strategy
Description: This is a test strategy. It does stuffs.
Ally: Test has been activated by you. Something changed.
Enemy: Enemy activate test. Very good. Very bad. Very normal. Can be better.

Name: Test Strategy 2
Description: This is another test strategy. It does other stuffs. Better or worse.
Ally: Test 2 has been activated by yours truly. Stuff happened. Or does it?
Enemy: Enemy activate test2. Extremely important. Maybe. But maybe not. Who can say?

Description: Call down blood rain!
Call down blood snow!
Call down thunder snow!
Conjure cloud.
Call down dark snow!
Call down acid rain!
Conjure fog.
Call down hail!
Call down rain!
Pandamonium! Randomly create weather!
Call forth a sandstorm!
Call down snow!
Call forth a storm!
Clear the weather!
Conjure wet fog!
Call forth wind!
